
# Registration

Registration for the conference is free. If you plan to attend the conference, please complete the following short [form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeFfW5KyoOhVm9q1jgB3BBV80FDH0A-fnD4-gAWj0aGXQN07g/viewform?usp=pp_url).

<br/>

Those who registered by 9am on Friday, October 20 should have already received an email with Zoom and other info. The Zoom link can be found on the Schedule page of the conference website.
